Description:
In spite of everything , everywhere and always play Football Manager 14 will be the first game of the series , available to owners of Linux.
In addition, players will be able to use cloud storage , allowing them to pursue a career manager on any computer on either end of the world. FM14 also be associated with the Steam Workshop, which means that managers will be able to easily create and publish game related materials, such as sets of pictures / posters , new and changed events, as well as unique test - this will help them test the new editor .
